Deemos was hit by the 8 shots and and stumbles onto his face. H raises to
his knees.

Deemos: Damn. I'm a bit weak from this fight.

Deemos looks at his soldiers and partners.

Deemos: They look okay...

----- Original Message -----
From: <Rudra656@...>

Sent: Sunday, May 27, 2001 11:01 PM
Subject: Re: War at Chivtron's Base!!!


> ::Aerotaur::
>     He tries to move out of the way but the four shots hit his left thigh.
> He probably would've fallen except that he was still in the air.  "Thank
you
> for the assistance."  He shouts at Axis.  "But this is my vendetta.  I
would
> appreciate it if you helped the others."  He flies at Deemos again.  The
left
> side of his body hanging limp.  He fires an eight shot barrage out of his
> right arm cannon.
